item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey i need helo on how to make this command take 50m form inventory. also make sure to add if player does not have enough cash to say to player you dont have enough cash.

if (cmd[0].equals(“bandosarmor”) && p.rights >= 2) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11724, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11726, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11728, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11696, 1);
}

Thanks
